name: identity-privacy-sdk
description: SDK for privacy-preserving identity management on blockchain using Zero-Knowledge Proofs and EIP-4337 Account Abstraction

scripts.test:sdk: npm run test:utils && npm run test:identity && npm run test:userOp && npm run test:contracts
scripts.build:circuit:compile:register: mkdir -p build/circuits && npx circom2 circuits/register.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym -o build/circuits
scripts.build:circuit:compile:commitment: mkdir -p build/circuits && npx circom2 circuits/commitment.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym -o build/circuits
scripts.build:circuit:compile: npm run build:circuit:compile:register && npm run build:circuit:compile:commitment
scripts.build:circuit:info: npm run build:circuit:info:register && npm run build:circuit:info:commitment
scripts.build:circuit:export:verificationkey:reg: npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/circuits/register_final.zkey build/circuits/register_vk.json
scripts.build:circuit:export:verificationkey:com: npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/circuits/commitment_final.zkey build/circuits/commitment_vk.json
scripts.build:circuit:export:solidityverifier:re: npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/circuits/register_final.zkey contracts/RegisterPlonkVerifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit:export:solidityverifier:co: npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/circuits/commitment_final.zkey contracts/CommitmentPlonkVerifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit:export:solidityverifier:re: npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/circuits/register_final.zkey contracts/RegisterGroth16Verifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit:export:solidityverifier:co: npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/circuits/commitment_final.zkey contracts/CommitmentGroth16Verifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit:export:solidityverifier: mkdir -p build/contracts && npm run build:circuit:export:solidityverifier:register:groth16 && npm run build:circuit:export:solidityverifier:commitment:groth16 && node scripts/customizeVerifierName.js
scripts.build:circuit:register: npm run build:circuit:compile:register && npm run build:circuit:info:register && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:export:verificationkey:register && npm run build:circuit:export:solidityverifier:register:groth16
scripts.build:circuit:commitment: npm run build:circuit:compile:commitment && npm run build:circuit:info:commitment && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:export:verificationkey:commitment && npm run build:circuit:export:solidityverifier:commitment:groth16
scripts.build:circuit: npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:info && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:export:verificationkey && npm run build:circuit:export:solidityverifier
